Reviews.Title: “Great base for holiday”
Reviews.Author: travelfam5991
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a spacious 2 bedroomed unit on the one wing towards the end of the block, which allowed for more privacy. Rooms were very clean, and would highly recommend. Pool was nice and relaxing after a day at Disney.

Reviews.Title: “We would definitely recommend”
Reviews.Author: SELYTS
Reviews.Content: As previous reviewers have said the apartments are extremely spacious. We found the staff very friendly and helpful and the restaurant/bar was great for a relaxing evening but not so good for breakfast (we only ate breakfast there once and wouldn't recommend but the evening meals were very good). The pool was quite shaded at times but that wasn't a problem for us and there is a sun deck where you can sunbathe all day if you want to. For the money we couldn't fault this place and if we return to Orlando we will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “A better place than home.”
Reviews.Author: emiliamafra
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a 3 room flat and it was amazing. It was very spacious, with a living room, balcony, a fully equiped kitchen and two bathrooms, being the master bed one huge, with two sinks and separated shower and bath tub. We arrived early, so the hotel kept our lugagge for no fee, doing the same after the checkout. I also bought some stuff online and had it delivered in the hotel, wich kept it upon my arrival, charging a u$5 fee per package. The low point was the wi-fi internet, wich worked poorly in the room. The hotel was also well located, next to the Sea World and a Premium Outlet mall, and has shuttles to the main parks. Free parking as well.

Reviews.Title: “A few disappointments, but overall a good stay”
Reviews.Author: faithntim9890
Reviews.Content: The first 2 days of our stay began a little rough. I went to iron a shirt, didn't notice there was some gunk on the bottom of the iron, and proceeded to ruin an $80 shirt. I called the front desk and explained the issue--they offered to bring me another iron, but didn't offer to do anything about the shirt. The other disappointment was the internet speed. We rarely had any connection at all for our first 2 days, and when we did it was so slow we couldn't even check email. They must have changed something later, because it was much better by the end of the week. Complaints aside, I would stay here again. It is a great value for the money, the staff are friendly, there is plenty of room to spread out, the pool is very nice, everything is clean, and as a bonus I could watch the Disney fireworks from my balcony.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place for a family get away!”
Reviews.Author: Milwaukeemom23
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Lake Eve during our spring break trip and were very happy with it! The "room" was wonderful. We had a 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom suite that was wonderful for the the 4 adults and 3 children in our party. It was very clean and spacious and we had all of the comforts of home. We enjoyed time in the pool both days we were there and loved the sun deck on the lake. Our only complaint was that the shuttle service used by the resort had such limited service (only one trip to Disney and Universal Studios and one return trip each day) that it made it useless so we ended up driving ourselves and paying the parking fees at each park. It is a great location convenient to all that Orlando has to offer. We will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel but............”
Reviews.Author: walesinc
Reviews.Content: We (family) stayed at this hotel during the last week in march 2012, the first impression of the suite "platinum" was very nice but after a closer inspection you could be picky and find some faults here and there but to be fair the suite was still very nice, with the platinum suite you get a corner room with a lake view (really the view was nothing to right home about but I guess its still a view). Now to the buts....... the pool is sandwich between the 2 hotel towers which basically leaves it in the shade which made the pool not warm during our trip and a better job needs to be done in cleaning the pools. This is the main reason why I am giving the hotel 4 stars (I would have preferred to give it a 3.5 but I don’t have that option and this point may not really matter to a lot of people...... the GYM is the worst gym I have ever being to in an hotel the 2 treadmill does not work, and the other 2 equipments needs to be updated/replaced, no weights e.t.c like I said a lot of people do not go to Florida to go to the gym so this might not matter to them. All in all the hotel is decent, the staff were all nice, the ones I encountered anyways and on a side note - we order food from one of the best Italian food delivery places "Famas".

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: LovetoVacation32
Reviews.Content: We booked Lake Eve Resort on Expedia and got an outstanding rate for the hotel and a car! When we first got there they could not find our reservation right away because my name was entered wrong but they found it very quickly with my confirmation number. After that, check in was very easy and the staff was very friendly. We were impressed with the size of the room. It was nice to have two bedrooms and we enjoyed the separate whirl pool tub and shower in the master bedroom. My daughter thought it was very cool to have her own bathroom! The kitchen was well stocked with dishes. We only ate breakfast and snacks in the room though as we like to eat out a lot on vacation. We thought Lake Eve Resort was in a great location. It was very close to Disney and not to far from Universal. Also close to lots of restaurants. If you are going to Sea World, it is nearly next door. We didn't have any problems with the cleanliness of the rooms as stated in previous reviews. Our rooms were very clean and housekeeping came everyday to take out the trash and make the beds. They would even load the dishwasher if we left dishes out! The staff was great, always very friendly (especially Thelma, who seemed to always be there, she was great). My daughter accidentally broke one of the soap dishes and we were a little worried that they would charge us for it but they acted like it was no big deal and said they would replace it right away. We did have one day where there was no hot water for awhile but it was fixed before we went to bed so we still got our hot showers in and the staff apologized profusely about it when we checked out. We would definitely stay her again!

Reviews.Title: “STAY AWAY!”
Reviews.Author: MadelynB15
Reviews.Content: The worst hotel stay experience in my life. Bugs on the coach, horrible smell in the room, no hot water, and terrible customer service. Do yourself a favor and save your money. Anywhere would be better than this place. My advice in two words: STAY AWAY!!

Reviews.Title: “I found the best resort in Orlando!”
Reviews.Author: labubske
Reviews.Content: I love this place. It is in a great location. The rooms are beautiful (I had the two bedroom). The price is great. The grounds are amazing. Beautiful pool. It is of course right on a lake. The staff is friendly and helpful. There is a restaurant on site with reasonable prices. I just cannot say enough how much I love this place. We will return again and again. By the way, I started out with a slumber party for my birthday girl and her friends and ended up staying longer and replacing my daughters friends with my two boys. Oh, and the pool is heated (that was a must since we went in January).

Reviews.Title: “would reccomend”
Reviews.Author: canjaru8
Reviews.Content: As the title says, great place to stay with kids,much better than a hotel room its like being at home,very clean and the rooms are cleaned every day we had a great holiday and when you come back from all the parks you need a nice place to unwind, wish i was back there. WELL DONE LAKE EVE RESORT STAFF, One small note for the managment, i think it would pay for you to have a neon sign installed outside the hotel so you people can see you late at night,we strugled a little after a long flight. AS THE AMERICANS SAY GOOD JOB SWEET CHEEKS.

Reviews.Title: “experince at lake eve resort. MR A SINGH.”
Reviews.Author: ankarbirmingham s
Reviews.Content: fantastic hotel staff very good, could not fault them any problems with anything and they sought it within minutes especailly thelma frarguig she was a star help make our holiday a dream to remember. a very big thankyou to all the staff lake eve resort should be proud of all there staff, definitely stay there again plus very good location for most disney parks.

Reviews.Title: “Great! Amazing! Loved It!”
Reviews.Author: MamaCarrera
Reviews.Content: The resort is beautiful and we were in awe of how "at home" we felt in the suite. I definitely could not imagine being in a regular hotel room with our 4 kids. The only item in the room that was not family friendly was the small garbage can under the sink. We were constantly having to empty garbage. This would not hinder us from visiting again, although I would suggest the resort considers a more practical garbage can with lid. In addition, the food was good and the bartender was a joy but the food prices were a bit ridiculous. Overall, we love Lake Eve and are looking for an excuse to visit again! :-)

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel will return!”
Reviews.Author: WalesFamily
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a fantastic 2 week stay at Lake Eve. Check in easy and was given room on 1st floor but explained that I had emailed earlier to request a high floor room with a view of the disney fireworks and was immediately allocated room 1313 which was great with un obstructed views of Lake Eve and not overlooking any other balconies and at the end of a corridor. The 2 bedroom apartment was huge with a washer/dryer which we used often, even better to arrive home with cases full of clean clothes! Everything you could want in the kitchen and they supplied tea towel, dishwasher powder, washing up liquid and kitchen roll. Bathrooms were clean and plenty of towels and shampoo/conditioner/soap and the walk in shower was massive. Whirlpool bath an added bonus to soak those aching feet after a day at the parks. Hairdryers in bathrooms were pretty powerful too. Plenty of space in the living area and tv in all rooms. Used the pool and hot tub several times (pool towels provided) and the sun is on the loungers next to the pool from about lunchtime to late afternoon but not actually on the pool itself. The sun deck had the sun all day and it was fun to spot the fish & turtles swimming in the lake. The hotel offers a free courtesy bus to Seaworld which leaves at 8.10am arrives Seaworld by 8.30 and then goes on to Universal to arrive by 9am. We used this shuttle a few times as it suited us but the one to Magic Kingdom went rather later in the morning and we like to get to parks early to try and do most of the rides before it gets busy which it did do as we went during the Easter holidays. Would definately recommend lake eve for its massive rooms, facilities and quiet location at the south end of international drive and there is a lovely well stocked publix supermarket about a 10min walk from the hotel and bus stop just outside.

Reviews.Title: “Value with extras”
Reviews.Author: Susan R
Reviews.Content: I just returned from staying at the Lake Eve Resort. It is everything that they present it to be on the website. I read all the reviews before chosing this hotel and I was concerned. Thankfully it was a very pleasant experience. We have two teenagers who were pleased to have their own room! This is a change because when we travel we always stay in the same room and it can be a bit crowded. This was the most spacious hotel room we ever had. The two bedroom is the way to go if you are traveling with family. The washer and dryer were also a bonus. We intended to cook in , but never got around to doing so. We did not eat in the restraunt, (aside from a stale bagel) but the surrounding area offers so many options. I did not give this the full 5 rating for a few reasons. First, the restraunt is so small and the bar area is small as well. We booked through expedia so we got the 14th floor. We seemed to be the only ones on the floor and the hotel was not full so I'm sure we could have gotten another room. The problem with the 14th floor was the noises from the wind and other noises from the roof that I can't explain (1409 was our room). It bothered me the first night, but then I got used to it. People we met in the lobby said switching rooms was a pain so we didn't pursue that option. The check in process was slow and the pool gets shaded after a certain time of the day so you are limited to sun on the pool deck. The do have a sun deck attached to the property, but it is buggy. The cleanliness of this hotel was top notch. My husband is a hotel snob so if he was pleased I'm sure most of the population would be. The good out weighs the bad with this hotel. Our t.v. was not working and someone came and fixed it promptly. The room was always attended to while we were gone and there were plenty of towels. The location of this hotel is perfect. It is not in a busy part of International Dr. and yet it was close to the attractions. We did not use the transportation to and from parks because the times were not what we were looking for in our arrival and departure. (We like to get going early and return early). The drive to the parks was simple so we didn't mind paying the parking fee. The concierge was very helpful in our trips to the park. I would definately stay at this hotel again if we ever return to the area. Great value for a very nice stay.

Reviews.Title: “Double Triple check your reservation”
Reviews.Author: Abhishek S
Reviews.Content: Booked the hotel. Went to the front desk and they said that they cancelled my reservation. This is after the fact that I called them up and confirmed the reservation and they even gave me a confirmation number. Also the person at front desk then said that they do not even have any rooms available. At this point I was helpless and could not do anything. Finally when I started calling my travel agent and showing the mails that I fortunately carried showing that I have confirmed payment. Then the lady at front desk started telling oh we may have just one suite available. Apparently the manager cancelled the room reservation accidently. Then after giving me the room they took my number saying that manager will talk to you during your stay and clarify the confusion. I am still waiting for that call. Just ruined the whole trip for me. Also DO NOT order food in the hotel. Its just awful. Other than that the hotel was like any other orlando resort. So please make sure you call up and check your reservation with such callous staff managing the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay”
Reviews.Author: luciaklem
Reviews.Content: We had a 2 bedroom suite and it was our home away from home. The suite was very clean and it was exceptionally big. I would stay in this hotel again.The kitchen was nice, and very clean. Perfect for families.

Reviews.Title: “Great base for Disney”
Reviews.Author: Andy J
Reviews.Content: Reading the reviews left before our visit we were worried that Lake Eve might be a let-down. Thankfully it was not and we really enjoyed the stay. The suite was huge with lovely rooms, great equipment, and clean bathrooms great really! The hotel was very clean and modern, the free coffee and cookies were a bonus! Pool was ample with no complaints, plenty of towels about. We didn't eat at the hotel so we can't vouch for that but we did buy some snacks from their little shop. In terms of location we were about 5 mins from SeaWorld, 10 to Disney and 15 to universal, great location! We only used the shuttle one but it was great! You have to register the day before so you are guaranteed a seat, the driver was on time, safe and friendly. I would say it would be better if you could book the return trip the night before too but you have to call from the park. As per complaints, the pull out bed was a bit tired, we had some flyers put through the door (not really an issue but some people don’t like) and the hotel didn’t have a hotel feel more like a block of apartments. Overall through it was a great place to see.

Reviews.Title: “Lake Eve Resort”
Reviews.Author: Nicole M
Reviews.Content: Booked this hotel through a GREAT rate on travelocity , but after staying at this hotel I would definitely book this hotel for the regular rate. It was awesome and I loved the view. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Also, having the shuttle back and forth to the parks greatly helped with or stay.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding”
Reviews.Author: Hot-n-Miami
Reviews.Content: We stayed for a week during March 2012. We rented the condo for 6 to 8 persons and it was incredible. The view of the lake was beautiful, the entire place was very clean, the staff was helpful, it was very quiet for the most part. The balcony was very relaxing as well as the hot tub in the master bathroom. The rooms were cleaned daily which was a suprise for us. I loved the place and will definitely recommend it to everyone planning a multi-person stay in the Orlando area. Thank you so much staff, I really appreciate the outstanding service and hospitality. The condos are close to the parks, but far away enough to be nice and peaceful. The only issue we had, was the first nite. One of the obviously intoxicated guests decided to have a loud conversation on his balcony at 4 a.m. in the morning. I am not sure if this condo has security or not, but this behaviour was not typical during our stay. The same person was seen sleeping on his balcony the following morning. He had taken a bed from inside the condo and moved it out onto his balcony to sleep...serious...where is security for things like this??? Other than that issue, we had a fantastic stay. Definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Lake Eve Resort”
Reviews.Author: Fhanra
Reviews.Content: When we arrived we were greeted and quickly checked in, directed to all the hotel had to offer, bar /food/shop pool area{which offers towels for guest use to the left of the pool area} a large sun deck is buil onto the lake which is quite and tends to be kid free. The 2 bedroom suite is huge. When we walked in through the front door we were greated with a large open plan room, Kitchen to the right has all you could want, large fridge/freezer, 4 ring cooker/oven, microwave, cups plates etc. to the right is the dinner table, washer and dryer and in front of us was a large sofa and a signal arm chair, with a 42'' tv. The master room is large with a huge bed and a 42''tv, ensuite with a double sink, shower and a whirlpool bath, the second bedroom has 2 double beds with another 42'' tv. There is more than enough storage room for all your clothes. Every room has a fan and there is airconditioning. I have only one issue and thats with the sliding door to the balcony, I feel there should be a red warning strip across the glass, very standard in most hotel's, helps to prevent people walking into them. Housekeeping was great, hotel service was also great. This is a great hotel. The only downside is the hotle is away from everything, you must drive or use the i-ride to get to eveything, we are at the bottom of International Drive and shops, pubs food is mostly at the other end.

Reviews.Title: “not a 5 star resort............”
Reviews.Author: MarylandCdh
Reviews.Content: ..........but the price is right. First of all, this is a hotel, not a resort. There are no amentities other than valet parking that you wouldn't find at a moderately priced hotel chain. What they do have going for them are newer, large "condo style" rooms that are priced like a standard hotel room, so if you are looking for value, consider this. We stayed 4 nights March 18-22, 2012. We had problems that took more than one conversation to get resolved. We arrived late, (10:15pm). We were put in the ADA accessible 2br unit. The master room was fine, but the 2nd br had a king when we were expcting 2 doubles for our 2 kids. The sliding door to the balcony was locked with a special lock that only hotel staff can open. Called downstairs, night manager said "all 2br units are two kings, that none have what the website shows, but you can check tomorrow and we'll move you to a 3br for the same price." Left to go to grocery store, stopping by front desk to ask about lock - "I'll send someone up right away". Returned from store, door still locked. Called downstairs - new front desk person: "sorry, we had high school kids staying recently and we lock them so they can't hang out on balconies, but only maintenance can open them and the maintenance people are all gone." Next morning, realized a doorknob on bathroom and a lounge chair in living room was broken, propped up on a broken leg...told the front desk on the way to disney. Came back, asked about the previously mentioned upgrade to a 3br....new manager: "only the ADA 2br units have 2 kings, we can move you to a 2br that has a king master and two doubles in the 2nd bedroom".....so it took 3 conversation with 3 different people to get what the website said we would get.....frustrating to say the least. This hotel is a great value, but it is obvious where they cut costs: it is newer and clean, but certainly lower end furniture in rooms, low number of staff, beds not real comfortable, etc. Pool area not cleaned until mid-morning, ordered pizza from the onsite restaurant - took 45 minutes. And the previous reviewers were right, the pool area is in the shade, no sun. Also, had some guests in the pool late (after 10pm) making some noise which echoes through the U shaped building design which was a distraction. The bottom line is this: if you are looking for a low priced clean hotel that you can put a family of 4 in one unit, convenient to disney - easy 10-15 minute drive - this is your place. If you are looking for higher end or luxury resort amenitites and service, keep looking

Reviews.Title: “3 weeks March 2012 at Lake Eve Resort was Fantastic!!!”
Reviews.Author: CollinsFamilyCanada
Reviews.Content: I read alot of Reviews from Guests about this Resort, and I must say that our stay at this resort was Fantastic.. we checked in on March 6th and checked out on the 22nd. had a very spacious 3 bedroom, which was very clean and cleaned daily by thier friendly staff.I had read a concern about bed bugs, and on our first day there a gentleman from the hotel with a trained dog entered our room to search for those little critters and did not find any, we did not see any bugs there at all it was vary clean. the whole resort had a warm friendly feel about it and not once did we have any concerns about the staff like i read in some of the other reviews.. i think that if you bring negative energy with you, you will get it in return just from your vibe you give off. our experience there was far from negative as every employee there from the house keeping staff right through to the front desk was nothing but smiles and pleasent. our room was on the 12th floor and was centered with a direct view of Lake Eve and the surrounding area, the pool was refreshing after a hot day and the dock down to the lake was breath taking with all the flora and wildlife abundant in that area. we did book during spring break so there where alot of children groups there the second week of our stay, but for the most part the hotel staff keep things running smoothly for the other guests. one night there were some noisey teenagers in the room below us, that keep us up for part of the night while they partyed on their deck below , but after we called the front desk they took care of it, and it was quiet after that. the shuttle service to the theme parks and the local trolley service up and down international drive was great to have, as we were centerlly located to all the great things that area had to offer. the staff at the ticket office to the attractions at the front desk was also very friendly, and one particular young man with glasses and sandy hair was one of the most imformative people i had met on our trip(he needs a raise lol). i would highly recommend this resort to anyone travelling to the florida area , as we had 5 of us in our group aging from 14 to 79 and all had a wonderfull time there. Great work Lake Eve and thank you for making our holiday an unforgettable one, that we will always remember fondly. we will be back you can guarantee that.

Reviews.Title: “Love this place!”
Reviews.Author: TiffanyDouglass11
Reviews.Content: I went on a vacation to Florida in May of 2011 and had an awful experience at another resort in the area. After some help from Expedia.com, I was relocated to Lake Eve resort. The staff was incredibly helpful given my situation. Check in was fast and the rooms/grounds are beautiful. I was given a lake facing two bedroom villa-style room that my boyfriend and I shared with another couple. The room was spacious, beds were amazingly comfortable, and the hotel amenities were definitely a plus. I will be returning to Lake Eve this year and may and most likely any time I travel to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Love this place!!! Will return!”
Reviews.Author: michtraveler81
Reviews.Content: We just came back from Orlando about 5 days ago. I booked a 1 bedroom suite at Lake Eve just over a month ago. I was a little worried about what some of the reviews had stated. We just stayed for 4 nights but I wish we would have taken a longer vacation. The room at Lake Eve was wonderful!!! It is so much better than the typical hotel room (which are basically bedrooms with a toilet and shower). Even though we had the smallest on the rooms available, it was so spacious! The pictures on Lake Eve's website are what you get! The kitchen had full sized appliances (fridge, stove, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker). Basic kitchen supplies are provided (mixing bowls, pitcher, cooking tools, knives, silverware, wine glasses, glass tumblers, coffee mugs, plates, scrapers, pot holders, placemats, pots, pans). Also, dishwashing liquid and dishwasher powder was provided. Right off the kitchen were two bi-folding closet doors. One contained the heating/cooling until for the individual room. The other housed the stacked washer and dryer. Laundry detergent is not provided. Before leaving on our trip, I bought some single-use Tide packets in the sample section at my local Walmart.... Worked great and was acceptable for airlines 3-1-1 rule to carry liquid. Next is the dining/ living area. Our room had a nice round dining table with 4 chairs. The living area had a chair (which really was not very comfortable), and a couch which folded out to provide more sleeping space. A coffee table was there along with an end table and two lamps were in the living area also. There was a LCD tv on a rather tall tv stand. My daughter was happy as the tv received Nickelodeon and the Disney channel. The tv, however, did not receive HD-quality programming. A remote to the tv was provided, as was a channel listing in the hotel guide binder that is in the room. There is a ceiling fan also located in the living area. The bedroom was nice! We had a one bedroom suite which included 2 queen sized beds. Bedding was nice and comfy. Each bed was set with 4 pillows each. There was a nightstandin between the two beds which had a lamp on it, a 2nd telephone and an alarm clock. The alarm clock actually had the cord to plug into your jack on your phone to utilize the clock/radio as a speaker for your phone or mp3 player. And like always, a Holy Bible was provided. There was a nice dresser in the bedroom. Had 6 wide drawers. Atop the dresser was an LCD tv. Again, a remote was provided for that tv also. There is a closet in the bedroom that contains several hangers, a shelf, an iron and ironing board and the in-room safe to store valuables. It's a digital safe and you use your own passcode. There is also a ceiling fan in the bedroom. Right outside the bathroom and bedroom is a linen closet. Provided in the closet was a complete set of bedding, extra towels, and two extra pillows. The bathroom was nice. Again we had a 1 bedroom suite so it was not the "master bath" seen in the pictures online. It had a tall granite-topped sink. A good amount of towels were provided upon check in. A towel bar was right by the sink, as was a hairdryer. Bar soap, shampoo and conditioner was provided. The bath shower was a tad bit strange. The bath was a wide jacuzzi tub surrounded by tiled walls. The showerhead was fixed and was not a handheld head. Iam 5'4" and it was almost too high up for me to reach, even on tip-toes. The water was always hot and a constant temperature. I took several very long showers and there was never a fluctuation in water temp. Another towel bar is located right outside of the shower. There are two seperate switches in the bathroom, onefor the lights and the other for the exhaust fan. We ate a couple times at the restaurant downstairs. It was good. Not too pricey and decent food. Hotel staff was ALWAYS friendly!!! They said bye and hi to us as we came and went. All maids were friendly, as were all the maintenence staff. The pool is vacuumed and cleaned every morning!!! The jacuzzi was also cleaned in the morning and the pH levels were always being checked. I will surely be staying here again if we visit Orlando in the future. It is a nice, clean hotel. Our 5 year old daughter loved it!!! Do not hesitate to pick Lake Eve Resort. It is very well maintained with all amenities you need. It is located in a quiet, yet growing area on I-drive. Although walking to some stores is possible, it really isn't practical. There is a new Walgreens being built close by but is not complete yet. There is also a Publix really close by. I highly recommend staying here.... Especially with a family. You aren't crammed into a single room like other hotels. Also the private balcony was great! They provide 4 patio chairs and two small patio side tables. There is also a patio light that can be used :) I hope you find my review helpful and if I forgot anything, I'll be sure to add it!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Gerry R
Reviews.Content: We were very happy with this resort. It was spacious and very clean. Would love to return for a longer stay. Very close to Disney and a catholic church is minutes away!

Reviews.Title: “What a nice surprise!”
Reviews.Author: Rustybug860
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised by Lake Eve! I drove straight throughout to Florida and called ahead to see if I could stay a night early, as I was only staying one night! The staff was eager to help. I got in and loved the suite! A full kitchen, living room area, bar seating and a dining table. There was a small balcony, but it was sufficient. The gym was very small and had few machines and noe weights. I was thankful I was the only one there. I loved the sun deck on the lake and the pool was large enough not to be crowded. The restaurant is small, but the bar tender was spot on when reccomending my dinner and he was helpful, friendly and very nice to a solo traveler.

Reviews.Title: “Great family holiday”
Reviews.Author: IGordon
Reviews.Content: We were at Lake Eve in July 2011 2adults 3 kids excellent suite, all comforts of home all staff very friendly nice bar, pool was great for kids. Lake eve is on bottom of I Drive so quiet but with I trolley stops at lake eve is handy to all attractions, there is a handy Publix department store just 2 stops south on I trolley so we were able to do 2 weeks in Orlando Florida on I drive without the hassle of car rental. So no worries about drink driving or getting lost we had a ball. Would definitely go back to Lake Eve.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay with a group.”
Reviews.Author: junenewsome
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed at Lake Eve Resort with son and family for Twirlmania. Granddaughter is a twirler and we always love to go up to see her in the competition. We usually stayed inside Disney and of course that's great but this was a very pleasant experience. We had a lovely 3 bedroom unit which was spacious and had all the necessary amenities. Kitchen was fully equipped with dishes, etc and had a dishwasher which was fantastic. We had a washer and dryer and two large bathrooms. The master bath has a whirlpool tub and a large shower. Lake Eve is conveniently located near Disney, Universal and Sea World as well as many restaurants. There's a small restaurant in the complex and we came in late one night and wanted a snack so we were able to order a pizza and have it delivered up to our unit even though it was almost 11 o'clock. We didn't have the occasion to eat there any other time but the menu looked great. We didn't have time to use the pool but it looked very nice. I would definitely stay there again and highly recommend it to anyone looking for apartment type accommodations instead of just a room.

Reviews.Title: “Good value, but has some problems!”
Reviews.Author: Humbertompereira
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the lake Eve resort with my brother and my parents for 3 days, from January 3rd to Januart 6th of 2012! I didnt really searched things about it before i got there so it surprised me a lot! The rooms are really nice and clean, and really BIG! My parents stayed in the master bedroom, and they really liked the queen bed and the jacuzzi in the bathroom! My brother and mine bedroom were really big too! We had the lake view, and it was really pretty! The two "problems" we had were: -The hotel staff, that is not that professional, they do not treat the guests well and u kinda have to beg for attention! But my family and i didnt really needed them, so it was fine. -The extra taxes that they charge for each day(it was $7,50+taxes each day), they charge it and dont tell you, that way u just find out on the credit card! I knew it before we left so i asked them what are these extra taxes were for. So they said it was resort fees for the use of the wireless internet(that is really slow), for the use of the jacuzzi(seriously) and for the use of other amenities like that! IN SHORT, IT IS A WAY THEY FOUND TO GET MORE MONEY!

Reviews.Title: “Lake Eve Resort, Above expectations”
Reviews.Author: Michelot
Reviews.Content: Last month (feb 2012) we stayed with family (4 adults, 2 children) at this spacious hotel with very large apartments fully equiped - full kitchen, jacuzzi, laudry machine inside apartment, iron, etc. All you need when travelling with children. We got the 2 bedroom apart - one with a king bed and huge bathroom, and other with two queen beds and another bathroom. Very clean, staff nice, nice swimming pool and hottub and convenient ATM and ticket desk for main Orlando attractions. Sooo close to Premium Vineland, Outback, Walgreens and Publix. Would definitely stay there again and again.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: caraq90
Reviews.Content: Great for larger families, great service by staff and overall a pleasant stay. Would need a car as quite a distance away from shops for groceries. we had a lovely stay here, pool was never over crowded and kids enjoyed the extra space and tvs in each room.

Reviews.Title: “Very good value”
Reviews.Author: Laura M
Reviews.Content: I booked this resort back in August for our trip that we just returned from. I was so excited for our nights at Lake Eve.....but we were kind of disappointed when we arrived. The front desk people seemed kinda clueless, and when they got our room - we went up to discover it was a handicap room. Not a huge deal, but they didn't even bother to mention it to us or ask if we were okay with that......as I said, I booked this like 8 months ago and I had been looking at pictures since then, so it was sad to arrive and get a room that was very different from all the pictures....totally different layout, VERY low counters in the kitchen, no drawers....it was just something I wish they would have asked us before just sending a young married couple who is quite obviously not handicapped into that room. The room was still pretty nice - although the dishwasher seemed to just be sitting under the counter without being properly installed. Everytime we went to open it, it practically fell out! Didn't seem safe. Our bathroom was also altered for someone in a wheelchair, which kind of took any of the romance out of it....having a handicap seat thingy right smack in the open of the master bath. Like i said, not horrible - but just not what we were expecting and we were not warned. As we went to check out, I mentioned that it would have been nice if they told us about the handicap room - the girl looked at me like I was an alien and said nothing. Not "sorry" or even "Thank you for staying". So that was a less than pleasant way to end our stay at Lake Eve.

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING VALUE!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Tastey
Reviews.Content: This is such a gorgeous resort! The rooms all have views! The pool is wonderful with a toddler pool as well! The beds are soooooo comfortable! Pillow top just like at home. We are so happy to have found a place that fits our family comfortably for our multiple yearly trips from northern Fl. I have told all my friends about this place because most of them have kids and the extra bedrooms are such a blessing. This would be a fun place for a girls retreat as well! The staff is very courteous and the bell hop was very helpful. We ordered room service breakfast the first morning and it was delicious and inexpensive, big +! Also, it's very modern and comfortable. Gorgeous boardwalk out to a sundeck was a nice place to take a break from the family and read a book. The resort is closest to Seaworld but also just a couple minute drive to other parks as well. We stayed on the 14th floor in the middle. It's so quiet too! (I always hate when you go to a hotel and finally get the kids to sleep only to have other screaming children come bustling through the halls at all hours.) This place feels like you're the only one here. They also have a pool bar and grill. We haven't tried it, but it's a nice feature. The only thing I'd improve if I had one complaint would be for them to upgrade the towels. They're on the small, thin and scratchy side, but not a deal breaker. Overall, wonderful experience and great value!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel & great location”
Reviews.Author: lilg2010
Reviews.Content: The hotel is impressive upon arrival with a simple but nice lobby. The rooms are HUGE and elegant with granite countertops and a full size kitchen, with a large bathroom with a whirlpool tub. We stayed in a one bedroom suite on the 12th floor and it was beautiful, with a spacious balcony overlooking pool and Lake Eve. The only downside was the bed, and for us unfortunately , we probably wouldn't stay there again. The beds weren't what a high-end hotel would use and were probably the cheapest beds you could get on the market. Not something refreshing after a long day at theme parks.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel”
Reviews.Author: bradyfamilies5
Reviews.Content: we stayed on the 13th floor over looking the giant pond/lake in the back behind the pool. It was amazing, clean and the staff was friendly and Daniel at the disney ticket counter helped my husband with all of our ticket needs including the cirque show (also a must see for all ages). my daughter dropped a glass on the floor and it shattered (no brooms in the room) so I called down stairs for some one to come up and with in seconds a custodian was there to sweep/wipe and finally mop up all the pieces. Each day that we left we came back to the room to the dishes done beds made fresh towels new coffee and a spotless room. All in all a great family resort and cheap considering the area which I love this will be my new go to resort. We did not eat in the restuarant but we did order their pizza for room service (cheap room service) and it was o.k pizza. A family of 5 which we are can easily live like kings here while on vacation. We did not use the work out room but did see it looks nice. The pool was amazing and so was the seperate kiddie pool that was nice to see. Also Nicole the front desk clerk (you should ask for her) she got us a room where we could see the fire works you rock Nicole!!!! thank you stayed 02/07/2012-02/11/2012 brady's

Reviews.Title: “Great Value - Great Location (Almost Perfect!)”
Reviews.Author: 53oldskool
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here several times. Great value for families who are looking for space, comfort and amenities but not a lot of hotel style service. NOT a well managed hotel. Independently owned I am sure. Pool area is beautiful but seldom in the sun. What were the architect's thinking? Suites are well designed and built but common areas seemed to have been designed by a first-timer. There have often been school groups there when we have stayed. No trouble yet for us but I have read of rowdiness and considering the lack of professional management on site, it may sometimes be a problem. Our family loves Lake Eve as a good value alternative to "on campus" options at Disney. We'll be back.

Reviews.Title: “management doesn't care about guests”
Reviews.Author: mrsjowsy
Reviews.Content: Hotel is beautiful, very clean and modern, we stayed at hotel for new years eve and new years day, the night of the 31st was a disaster trying to find parking, they decided to give a party at the pool and people without passes were allowed to park in the parking lot , so guests of the hotel had no place to park, 1 in the morning person at front desk, yelling at guests and parking attendant, I ask the person at desk that I want it to talk to manager and he told me I didn't need to talk to manager and he proceded to to go outside and start fighting with the wonderful parking attendants that were trying to help people find parking. we were so nervous we couldn't sleep for the rest of the night. I send a letter to manager Catena and as of today january 23 2012 i had no response from her. Lake Eve resort is a beautiful building and this is not the first time we stay there, but they do not appreciate their guests, so next time we are in the area will be looking across the street the Sheraton or the Hilton Grand Vacations that their customer service is far superior than this place.

Reviews.Title: “Almost excellent-great value, lots of space”
Reviews.Author: dixiechickola
Reviews.Content: Our family--parents in their early 50's, grown children in their 20's--stayed at Lake Eve for one night during a long weekend in December 2011. We had a 2-bedroom unit on the 7th floor and were extremely happy with all the extra space. Lots of closets, plenty of towels, a large kitchen with major appliances, an in-room safe--all the extras were there. The beds and furniture seem newish. The master bath has a tub and a separate shower, two sinks, and two huge closets. The location is at the far southern end of International Drive, next door to the Premium Outlets Mall. There is a Publix grocery store within strolling distance (although it might be a bit much to stroll back with groceries) so it's easy to stock up on food and beverages instead of spending a fortune at area restaurants. The guests are a mix of US, Canadian, German and Brazilian citizens and it seems to appeal to families attending sports tournaments at Disney's Wide World of Sports complex. The desk staff was congenial --although if this was my hotel, I'd ask them to dress with a bit more professional polish. And that's the only thing lacking at Lake Eve. It's got top-notch condos, great amenities and a perfect location to enjoy the Disney parks--it only needs to step up its image and service to make it one of the more desireable stays in the Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “very spacious for families”
Reviews.Author: NIELD8969
Reviews.Content: We stayed here from 17th dec2011 till 31st dec 2011. We were suprised by the space of the apartments. you get a fully equiped kitchen.THE 2 bedrooms were of good size wthe comfy beds. in the master the jaccuzi bath was great along with the walkin shower. fabulous. The hotel staff were pleasent. the only downside is the sun doesnt go over the pool area.( But the pool was heated to perfection and the hot tub was great. Kids loved the pool. We stayed on the 8th floor and the view was lovely. when we visit Florida again we will defo stay at Lake Eve.

Reviews.Title: “What a Place!”
Reviews.Author: John R
Reviews.Content: On 12/31/2011 we arrived in Orlando around 8 pm and needed a place to stay. Being a party of 8 it was going to be difficult. Went online with my phone and got a 2 bedroom condo at 35% off. We arrived at the resort 20 minutes later and our reservation was not in yet. However the person at the front desk was very quick in getting everything ready. Within a few minutes we were inside the room. The hotel is fairly new so the rooms are very clean. Nice furniture and very comfortable beds, spacious living room and fully equipped kitchen. Bathrooms are very nice as well. Master bedroom had a king bed and a big bathroom with standing shower and jacuzzi style tub. 2nd bedroom had 2 queen beds, which is better than other places were there are full size beds. Also had a sofa bed. We stayed on the 11th floor which showed a nice view of the lakes and all rooms have a balcony with view of the pool. I like the fact that all rooms had their LCD TVs, with a big one on the living room. The hotel staff was very pleasant and always had a smile. Over all a great experience

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel at a Good Price”
Reviews.Author: TravellerfromBermuda
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel a few months ago with some family. Originally, my booking on hotwire.com said that I was booked in a one bedroom suite. When I arrived at the room and saw that we had a two bedroom suite I was pleasantly surprised. The accommodations were very comfortable and adequate. My friend had a birthday the day we arrived and I was able to pre-order a cake through the hotel and it was in the room waiting when we arrived. The rooms have a washer and dryer, full kitchen and a really nice master bath. The location of the hotel is great. It is at the south end of I-Drive. Walt Disney World is just minutes from here, SeaWorld is almost next door. There is a supermarket within walking distance from here. Best of all, the traffic around this area of I-Drive is not bumper to bumper like at the other end. I would recommend this hotel to people staying with family or large groups. Beware of the resort fee that the hotel charges.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect option for familys”
Reviews.Author: IGordon
Reviews.Content: Hotel was great, room was really big there were 5 of us in 2 bedroom apt , full-equipped kitchen, nice bathrooms, and also a nice pool view. The hotel is new, so everything was sweet. Room service was very good, new towels every day rooms cleaned every day. Location: its very close to the Premium Outlet from Vineland Ave,nice location not in busy area we didnt not take rental car but were able to go every where on the I-trolley. Good for family like ours.

Reviews.Title: “HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE”
Reviews.Author: james B
Reviews.Content: We checked in on the 1st of December and checked out on the 3rd of December 2011. On the 2nd of December 2011, a rowdy bunch occupied the room above us. They started the rucus around midnight and we called in to the front desk (including other guests in an adjacent room) and advised them of what was happening. We did not sleep until just after 4 am. On the time of our check out, I went to see the manager, who I assume was the assistant manager - a young fellow. I told him that though our first night was good, we did not get to sleep the second night and the stay was unsatisfactory. Like many established hotel chains, they would not charge you for the night in question. But the Manager did not even care and said he would not be able to do anything! I later contacted the General Manager Lisa Catena. I left a message and followed up with an email. NO RESPONSE!. This HOTEL does not care about it's guest. Your stay is a touch and go kind of situation. If you happen to get into a situation where your stay is not enjoyable, do not expext Lisa or the young manager to do anything. They get their paychecks and that is all that is important. The HOMEWOOD suites are fantastic! The breakfast which is inlcuded is phenomenal. STAY AWAY from Lake Eve Resort even if their prices may be good - it must be family run! Customer service is not one of their strengths - getting your money is their desire @ your expense.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent option for big groups and families”
Reviews.Author: RafaelGrottoli
Reviews.Content: Hotel was great, room was really big (we got the one with 3 bedrooms), full-equipped kitchen, nice bathrooms, and also a nice pool view. The hotel is new, so everything was just fine. Room service was very good, handling new towels every day. Location: its very close to the Premium Outlet from Vineland Ave, have gas station, walgrens, Mcdonalds close, but a little far from the Intl Drive restaurants. It is probably 5 minutes by car from Sea World and 10 minutes by car from Orlando Convention Center.

Reviews.Title: “Returning guest”
Reviews.Author: Lynne2011_11
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just returned from a 8 day stay at the Eve Resort. This was our second stay at the resort and both times we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The staff were friendly and the suite was wonderful, it was like a home away from home. Absolutely no issues. It was clean, comfortable, quiet and convenient. The location of our suite was terrific with a great view. The Eve Resort is our place of choice when staying in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Great space and location, poor customer service”
Reviews.Author: Tania S
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Lake Eve for 14 nights in October 2011. On arrival we were disappointed - a very small reception area, no 'typical American smiley welcome', no offer of help with luggage or to be taken to room. When we got to our room we were very impressed with the size (super king bed in master room, 2 queens in 2nd room and great living/kitchen space) but when we went to put the kids to bed we noticed holes in the sheets on both beds, and a stained counterpane on the master bed. When we called downstairs we were told that housekeeping wasn't available. We mentioned it again in the morning, were told that all sheets would be changed but they weren't - had to wait until the next day and 2 more conversations until they were. Once this was sorted, we had a great holiday - the hotel has an excellent location for all the main theme parks and I-Drive. Unfortunately the sun doesn't stay around the pool in the evenings, so was a bit cold in October (pool itself is warm though). The hotel had great sound-proofing, we didn't hear any other room noise.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, bad customer service”
Reviews.Author: Stacey22054
Reviews.Content: Our family of five stayed in a two bedroom suite for 7 nights. When we first arrived the lady that checked us in at the front desk was not friendly at all. She switched our reservation with someone else's and when we noticed the name on the paper was not ours and told her she immediately got another worker and walked off. She wouldn't even listen to us. The other worker checked us in but when we were asking questions about the bus to the parks, she just said she didn't know about it and gave us a paper. We payed for the kids triple play room rate but never got the kids goody bag they tell you on the site your supposed to get. Not even sure what that was, it was never mentioned. We were rushed through check in then they walked off. The rooms were nice and clean. We did have 3 light bulbs that were out and our living room chair was broken. We called the front desk and they did send a maintenance man up quickly to fix replace them. He was very nice, my husband told him about the chair just so they would know and not try to charge us when we left. He laughed and said no need to worry about that. I guess they are used to broken chairs. The hotel was nice and quiet, pool was pretty but we got in it once and it was extremely cold, the hot tub was not hot so my kids used that as the pool. We spent most of our time at the parks so didn't stay at the hotel much but we liked our rooms and loved having a washer and dryer. We rented a car so decided to use that and not mess with the shuttle. We spent one day at cocoa beach and the kids loved that, almost more than Disney. Wish I would have planned two days at the beach. Overall nice hotel but next time will probably stay somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Service”
Reviews.Author: Beth0313
Reviews.Content: The rooms here are decent for the price, just don’t expect any frills. The service was below standard and I’ll have a hard time going back because of it. There were four adults and two kids staying in our two bedroom suite. We were gone all day but the maid decided to come clean when we returned. We told her all we needed was some clean towels and that we didn’t need the room cleaned because we were putting the kids down for a nap. She gave me five towels so I asked her for three extra. She informed me that she didn’t have enough so we’d have to call the front desk to have them sent up. I called the front desk and they said they’d send someone right up. I guess they forgot about us because the towels never arrived! The resort also needs to clean up the halls and elevator areas. Pretty gross by the elevators.

Reviews.Title: “Professionalism Please!”
Reviews.Author: NC W
Reviews.Content: I stayed here back in February of 2011 while I was in town for a conference. The heat and air didn't work in my room for the whole trip. After repeated calls to the front desk someone finally came and looked at it stayed all of 5 minutes after he claimed he reset it. He said it should kick on in a minute or so and left. NEVER clicked on! So I get back home from my trip and I voice my displeasure to the General Manager who in turn gives me a complimentary 1 night stay. Mind you I stayed for 3 nights. So lets fast forward to October 2011. I'm ready to use my complimentary voucher for a trip I'm taking in November. I'm told that I can't use the voucher during the dates I'm staying because it's a "high demand" weekend. Now I have made a reservation prior to asking to redeem this voucher. I asked well can you just comp one of my nights using the voucher. I'm told no again! LOGICALLY if i've made a reservation and I have a voucher don't you think it would be ok to comp a night seeing as how I'm staying 3 nights anyway. Truth be told I'm trying to find a suitable destination for my international guests who will be arriving in May for a conference. I've stayed at 4 other resorts this is by far the best layout but the incompetence of some of the people makes me want to go else where. Depending on whether or not they change this around I may or may not ever stay here again. Lets see if they change their minds after they find out who I am.

Reviews.Title: “Wow!”
Reviews.Author: FLmom321
Reviews.Content: We are a family of six-- my husband & I with 3 teenage girls & a 10 year old son. We always look for a hotel suite or multiple rooms when we vacation. Lake Eve was perfect! We searched through Booking.com for a good deal & this was the best we found. A 3 bedroom suite for $149! I questioned whether it was in a good area & whether it was a nice place. We looked at the reviews & the worst reviews were that it didn't have free wi-fi in the rooms so we did a little research on the hotel website and found out that's not even true. When we arrived there was free valet parking, which was a plus. When we got to our room, we were VERY happy. The kitchen was very spacious. The dining table was large enough for all of us. The living area was ample. The balcony was huge! We had a view of the beautiful pool & lake. The bedrooms were a good size and warm & cozy. Bathrooms were pretty & clean. Everything seemed new & updated, We did have free wi-fi in our room. We ALL got a good night sleep, also, as the beds were very comfortable. We have nothing negative to say about our room. We were in Orlando to go to Universal. I almost didn't book Lake Eve because I wanted something close to Universal. But since we were so close to I-4 it didn't take long to get there and it was very EASY to get there. We loved that Lake Eve was situated on a quiet area of International Drive and yet so close to I-4. The only downer to our stay was in the morning when we all wanted breakfast. There was a breakfast buffet for $8 or you could order a la carte items. The buffet reminded us of nicer continental breakfast bars we've had at other hotels for free-- not worth $8. Some of the a la carte items on the menu looked good & reasonably priced but we opted to go out to breakfast where there was more variety. We went to the Denny's down the street. We ARE NOT Denny's fans-- we never go at home. But we were starving! This Denny's was actually not bad--we were pleasantly surprised! We are very happy that we ended up at Lake Eve. It was perfect for our family. We'd definitely go back!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Holiday”
Reviews.Author: Jacky G
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel because of location and it was perfect for what we wanted close to restaurants shops + attractions. The apartment was lovely much bigger than we expected with a full kitchen + washer dryer facilities which we did make use of. The bathroom was great with jaccuzi bath + large walk in shower with a second bathroom that we did not use. Bed huge + comfortable we had great view over looking lake + pool and spent time on balcony with nice glass of wine to relax after long hot day. Ate in Restaurant once lovely steak meal + very reasonable used pool + hot tub in the evening which was great after tiring days in themeparks. apartment kept spotless already planning to return 2012 with family cant wait....

Reviews.Title: “give us a smile!”
Reviews.Author: 117dawn
Reviews.Content: We picked this hotel because it offered a good location,the rooms where brilliant and we had maid service,plus i use the gym.The pool and sauna was great and the decking made up for the lack of sun around the pool after 15:30pm.The down side was the lack of reception and staff friendliness,a smile or hello would have been nice more often,on handing in our card when leaving,Frank did not even say"thank you for staying"in fact he said nothing has reception was busy. The most friendly person was phillipe at the bar.We also had to keep asking for supplies for the kitchen and we are really clean,but a extra sweep around, rather then every three days would have been better.The gym had a bike the first few days of ours hols but it was removed and not returned during our three week stay so there was just two running machines and a cross trainer and no weights.Sorry about the negitives but reveiws should give all accounts.

Reviews.Title: “Very Clean!=)”
Reviews.Author: n2teach
Reviews.Content: Don't laugh at my title...although I do care about comfort, cleanliness is my #1 priority. We rented a two bedroom condo that was absolutely spotless, so I was a happy camper for the duration of our stay. We've all heard the cliche' "If mama ain't happy, ain't nobody happy", so this was good.=) If you're used to a firm mattress, you may not be as comfortable as what you're used to, but there are extra pillows in the closets to shove under your back for a bit of extra lumbar support. The sheets are good quality, soft and satiny, and the walls are well insulated to insure a quiet sleep. The location is an easy drive to Disney and Universal, and there's a 24-hour Walgreens right down the road (just knowing that there's always a drug store open nearby made me feel better=)). Note: We inquired about the resort's free shuttle to Universal and were surprised that it left early that morning (only one scheduled departure time) and was to return at around 7 that evening (again only one scheduled time). Perhaps you can reserve shuttle times; I don't know...just be sure to ask about it ahead of time for planning purposes. In a nutshell: =) We'll definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Jenni H
Reviews.Content: We recently spent 9 nights in a 2 bedroom apartment at Lake Eve Resort. The apartment was gorgeous, lots of room and lovely views over the pool and the lake. We found the location excellent, only a short walk or I-ride trip to supermarket and outlet mall. The free shuttle bus to the theme parks was also great. The pool was excellent as was the pool bar - the barman working in that bar is a huge asset to the resort. Our only negative experience was with the front desk / reservation staff which resulted in us being locked out of our room. I will not go into details but I felt it could have been handled a lot more professionally. Some staff were friendlier than others, the restaurant staff were excellent. One server in the restaurant went above and beyond expectations to make our daughters birthday very memorable and for that we are very grateful. On the whole a great stay. We would recommend Lake Eve Resort to anyone and will be staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “Vacation with your Inlaws without killing eachother.”
Reviews.Author: rachel s
Reviews.Content: I got a great deal on Lake eve and wasn't sure what to expect. When we got to our "room" I was excited to see a large living room 2 large bed rooms and a full kitchen. We got our moneys worth and was able to vacation with my inlaws painlessly.

Reviews.Title: “Spacious Rooms, Very Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: xSarah_89x
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Lake Eve mid September for 10 nights. First impressions of the hotel, very clean and modern, some staff members more friendly than others, a 'Hello' does go a long way, and would makes guests feel more comfortable. The actual apartment was fantastic, we booked a 2 bedroomed apartment for 2 of us as this was the only accomodation left at this particular hotel, first impression was absolutely beautiful, spotlessly clean, view was gorgeous right over lake eve. Beds where comfortable, kitchen had all the utensils needed for a comfortable stay although we barely used them, ate out most nights. Jacuzzi bath in the ensuite bathroom was excellent, really relaxing after a very early busy day out. The best thing was the hotel was very quiet so had no issues with getting to sleep on an evening which can sometimes be an issue in a large hotel, but it was fantastic no problems with noise, even though the hotel was busy. Cleaners where very friendly and kept our room perfectly clean. The pool area was lovely, very clean, beautifully kept, cant comment on the restaraunt or snack bar at the hotel as we never ate from them. Location of the hotel at the VERY bottom of international drive, an I-Trolley stop is located just outside the entrance of the hotel, which suited us perfectly as we did not hire a car, but the i-trolley does stop at approx 10.30pm on an evening so you would have to use a taxi if you want to stay out any later for drinks or meal etc. The location is not a not an issue if you hire a car or use the i-trolley. The nearest shop is approximately a 15 minute walk south down international drive to the 'Publix' supermarket and there are a few eateries around that area, such as Subway, a Chines takeaway and Pizza Takeaway. Overall a lovely hotel I would reccomend it to friends and family, the only major let down is some of the members of staff who at times did not make us feel welcome, which is really uncomfortable. This is not aimed at all members of staff, as some in particular where absolutely brilliant and went out of their way to help us. Some Recommended things to do - I-Fly (In door Skydiving located north of international drive can be reached by I- Trolley, was absolutely fantastic) Universal Studios - Harry Potter World Kennedy Space Centre

Reviews.Title: “Family vacation”
Reviews.Author: jackie1219
Reviews.Content: Opted to stay off Disney property and was not disappointed!! We spent a week at Lake Eve resort and loved it!! Arrived late at night and were placed in a first floor condo, called and they moved us right to the 8th floor with no problems! Condo was spacious and comfortable for 4 adults and 1 child. Pool area and dock on the lake were spectacular. Location of resort is great!! Right near grocery store and premium outlet mall, but away from some of the cheesier spots in Orlando. Super convienient to get to Disney and Sea World, easy to access freeways to travel to Cocoa Beach as well. We will definately go back. Resort was clean, quiet, and comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “absolutley zero problems”
Reviews.Author: jethrojam
Reviews.Content: Stayed there for our honeymoon and was pleasantly surprised at all times. The people who worked there (notably the gentleman who was in charge of directions/tickets to shows - he repeatedly helped us despite fully knowing we had previously purchased all of our tickets previously elsewhere....and the poolside bartender who never stopped entertaining us with his own concoctions of heaven) were very nice and pleasant, the rooms where always cleaned and everything always worked fine. We noted everything from tripadvisor's complainers and prepped ourselves for them we paid via expedia so they couldnt cancel our room we got a rent a car to avoid their transportation to disney we only went to the indoor restaurant once out of laziness (it was terrible - but we knew it would be anyways) had no problems whatsoever with the staff or parking (the parking valet takes place on the weekends only and if you find a spot its yours, you just may have to hunt for it) the pool was fine if you just want to lounge around the deck was great, nice views i would recommend this place to everybody. we felt like were were in a honeymoon suite at a 1 star price. it would be perfect for a big family to stay there too, the multi rooms and bathrooms are great and the washing machine/dryer are fantastic when on a budget (checking big bags on flights are pricey) it is so close to disney and sea world. and knowing how long it takes to get from a disney hotel to a park via the free disney busing i can honestly say it is much quicker to drive from LE than staying at disney's reasonably priced hotels (and much bigger/nicer)

Reviews.Title: “NICE HOTEL, GREAT LOCATION BUT DISSAPOINTING SERVICE!!!!”
Reviews.Author: bcastillog
Reviews.Content: We have stayed before in this hotel and loved it 2 years ago that's why we decided to go back but it was a very disappointing surprise to find out that they do not fulfill what they advertise: Complimentary wireless Internet : The signal was sooo poor we couldn't even send an email without attachments!!! When we complaint they just said it was a complimentary service and tey just wiped off their hands! so if internet is important to you go to another hotel! Daily housekeeping: Be aware if you are looking to a regular hotel house keeping service! here they just bring you fresh towels and make the beds daily and just when we complaint they went and vacuum the carpets which were terribly dirty! Cleanliness of the hotel: all the carpets in the hallways, elevators and rooms are so dirty they stink!!!! Kitchen supplies: There is enough for a weekend but if you are planing to stay longer, you will need to buy a lot of stuff...

Reviews.Title: “Have stayed there twice”
Reviews.Author: gatorsid
Reviews.Content: Lake Eve Resort. Have stayed there twice and will go back again. Great place, clean, convenient, nice staff. Great location for all the parks in Orlando. Have free shuttle

Reviews.Title: “Nice but bed bugs”
Reviews.Author: mahalonuirb
Reviews.Content: We had a three bedroom suite at the resort over the Halloween weekend. I woke up the next morning of the first night with bite marks all over me and one of the bed bugs still feasting. I was able to squish it and actually had evidence to show the resort management. When I called to report the problem the attendant on duty told me I couldn't switch rooms and that they could only change the linen. Of course that answer didn't sit well with me. I waited until someone else was on duty and called three times until I received a satisfactory response. The manager on duty came up, inspected the bed and saw the bed bug still engorged with blood and couldn't do anything but apologize. I was walked to three different suites and allowed to inspect the rooms before before being changed to another room. Only after complaining vehemently was the 1st night made complimentary. Had a great time with friends the remaining two days at the resort. Took advantage of the gym. Only one of the treadmills worked well. A bunch of high schoolers had a party in one of the suites, other than seeing them run up and down the hall, you couldn't hear them to much. soundproofing was good. Yea! Cleaning staff did clean rooms daily, however they had a hard time removing smell of bacon from previous guest from our room. They sprayed freshner in the room several times and recleaned stove and microwave multiple times.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best”
Reviews.Author: TLSJH
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 7 nights from 5th August. We were anxious after reading some of the poor reports however we need not have worried as everything was great. All staff were friendly and helpful, the room was very clean, had all we needed and everything was in good working order. Location was good and the view from our balcony was lovely. There was no noise during the night - its probably the quietest hotel we have ever stayed in. We had the buffet breakfast on our first day - selection was fine, service was good and price was reasonable. The resort fee was clear at check in and we had no problems with the lifts or parking. We asked for extra pillows on arival and they were delivered within minutes. Pool area was good; the sun disappeared late afternoon but that wasnt a problem for us. We didnt use the gym and had no need for childrens facilities as our daughters are teenagers. All in all this is a great place to stay. We have been holidaying in Orlando for over 20 years and are Disney Vacation Club members so we ususally stay at Disney properties but for the last few years we have stayed at Disney for one week and tried soemewhere different for the second week; I can honestly say the standard of accomodation at Lake Eve is as good as any of the 5 star Disney resorts we have stayed at. We had a lovely relaxing week and would be happy to recommend and return to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC”
Reviews.Author: Jane S
Reviews.Content: Myself and my family have visited Florida many times, usually staying in villas. This time we decided to stay in an apartment and definitely made the right choice with Lake Eve. The apartments are just as comfortable as staying in a villa, with all the facilities you could possibly need. The beds were all large and very comfortable, and all three bedrooms had a lovely view of the lake. Both bathrooms were nice, the en-suite was very smart with a separate shower, twin sinks and a Jacuzzi bath! The kitchen was well equipped with a washing machine, dryer, large fridge etc . The only difference we found between the apartment and a villa was of course the shared pool, this was more than compensated for by the wonderful view from the balcony.... of the lake by day, and the lights of Orlando by night! The pool area itself was plenty big enough and there were always sunbeds available, the sun does go off this area late afternoon, but to be honest it was so hot we were quite happy by then to have some shade. The position of Lake Eve is excellent, this end of International Drive is quieter which is lovely after a day at the parks, but is within walking distance (10-15 minutes) or 5 minutes by bus, to a Publix where you can get any groceries you need, a McDonalds, Dominoes Pizza, a couple of other restaurants and The Premium Outlet shopping mall. The apartment was clean, the cleaners coming everyday was also a bonus and they even put the dishwasher on if we had gone out in a hurry and left some crockery out! , Any staff we met were very friendly and helpful, especially the young barman who we chatted to while waiting in the bar for our taxi to arrive. We were very impressed and will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay won't hesitate to go back”
Reviews.Author: Joanna C
Reviews.Content: Having read all the bad about Lake Eve sorry I could not find fault. Perfect location for parks. Rooms clean spacious and comfortable, Friendly staff always greated with warm welcome. Pool excellent. No probs with parking . No hesitation in recommending Lake Eve. Thanks for perfect holiday.

Reviews.Title: “worst hotel ever night mare”
Reviews.Author: davidharo5555
Reviews.Content: been to many hotels and resorts in my life and this is one i will never ever ever return to i was treated very very disrepectfull by the staff and charged extra fees and even was forced to stay an extra day witch they charged me 200 dollars. room service came to knock on my door 3 hours early to make sure if we were gone booked first floor got 10 floor have 3 kids how about that one . tv in room didnt work stayed for 3 days one day forced to stay cause they already had charged my credit card with out my permission wish to warn every one that is thinking of coming to orlando do not stay in these hotel have many issues about these hotel cold pool no heater kids got sick staff sucks not nice at all specially the one that claimes to be the mananger instead of solving problems makes problems worse looks nice on internet not so nice when you spend your hard earn money and have to deal with very misreaspectfull staff do not come to these hotel let these be a warning

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic all round!”
Reviews.Author: luxsey
Reviews.Content: Suites are excellent. Clean, spacious and excellent value. Comfy beds and great having washing machine and tumble dryer. Came here with our Martial Arts team and everyone was impressed even those who have been to Orlando before said this was a better option to a hotel. Nice pool area with pool towels. It gets the sun till 3pm then it comes back later but they have built a veranda out in the lake where they have sun loungers and you get sun all day. Excellent location.Sea world 5mins. Universal 10-15 mins and Disney 10-15 mins. Publix supermarket 5 mins in car. Airport 20 mins. If I return to Orlando this would be my choice again.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing place!”
Reviews.Author: MMcGhee2727
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice place and well worth the money spent. The staff was very friendly at check in. They gave me information about local restaurants and even coupons! When I walked into the room I was thrilled! It was huge! It was updated and very comfortable. I loved the shower and jacuzzi in the master bedroom. It was beautiful! The only drawback was the pool. It was nice and clean, just wish it was a little bigger. I will stay there again when vacationing in Orlando!!!

Reviews.Title: “Will never stay there again”
Reviews.Author: sjv1232
Reviews.Content: The hotel was nice looking but dirty and nothing was updated. The staff was not helpful at all. I would not recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing!”
Reviews.Author: wallpaper_01
Reviews.Content: Been down the bottom end of International Dr there isnt as much there yet but it is much nicer. The top end is starting to show its age. Everything down that end looks new, it is right next to the Premium Outlets and a big Publix, so thats shopping sorted! Domino's, McDonalds and a couple of restaurants in walking distance. The hotel rooms are HUGE! Stayed in Villas before and they are comparable to them, if not better in some ways! The pool was nice, although there were a lot of big groups that stayed there and they took over some days, but wasnt a huge problem. Maid service was great. Would definitely stay there again!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel but the Front Desk personnel need some add'l training”
Reviews.Author: Carelco
Reviews.Content: The hotel is beautiful, it's in a great location. We stayed in a 2 bedroom Platinum Room which is a corner room and it's a little larger than the standard 2 bedroom. It was worth the additional $10.00 a night. If you look at the pictures online the hotel looks exactly like the pictures. Gorgeous setting on a lake set back and even though it's on International Drive which is a busy street especially for people who are on vacation. This hotel is located in a quiet area. You still have access to lots of restaurants, shopping malls etc. My only issue with this hotel is the Front Desk staff. We amended our reservation and checked into the hotel a week earlier than our original check in dates. We were assured that we wouldn't have to move since we had two seperate reservations. When our original reservation date came, the Front Desk told us we would have to move into another hotel room. Although we're assured we wouldn't have to when we checked in. I had to go and argue with the front desk and got it all straightened out but I was very upset that they continued to tell me I had to move to another room. So that is my only complaint about this hotel. The Front Desk Staff needs some additional training.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place but wouldn't be one of my top choices to go back to”
Reviews.Author: mpjackson
Reviews.Content: Stayed for four days in a 2 bedrooms suite which was very nice & clean but not spacious. Only one swimming pool which was crowed most of the time. The view is beautiful & watching the sunset was amazing. Nice fitness room & close to a lake. Staff was very friendly & helpful. The good thing was noone harassed us about buying time shares.

Reviews.Title: “Fab hotal base for the parks”
Reviews.Author: AlsagerZippy
Reviews.Content: Spacious apartment in a hotel. Huge kitchen diner with longs, 2 large bedrooms, one en-suite with double shower and spa bath, a second bathroom with shower. Option to eat in at hotel, out at numerous nearby restaurants, self cater (supermarket and outlet shops very near).Ideally placed on International Drive. The porters even take your shopping up to the room for you if required to save multiple trips. All rooms overlook the pool. Some are 3 bed but 2 was enough for me and my 2 kids.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel would definately come back!”
Reviews.Author: cooky4
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel from 4 - 18th July - great experience all round. Brilliant shuttle service, better than using a car and paying $14 to park! Rooms large with good beds and decent furniture - kitchen well stocked with crockery, cutlery and most things you would need to prepare a meal. Maid service excellent, clean towels and consumables left on door even when requested no service required that day. Restaurant food is good, and also good value, very relaxed atmosphere. Staff were cheerful, pleasant and helpful. Did not spend much time around the pool but it was very clean and pleasant. We were on floor 12 and could see the nightly firework displays at Seaworld and Disney. Will be back!

Reviews.Title: “great holiday”
Reviews.Author: alexwat
