Reviews.Content: Booked this hotel with a package from Expedia. When we arrived they put us in a one bedroom instead of the three bedroom we had reserved. No problems getting that changed though; we simply showed the desk clerk our confirmation and she moved us. The rooms are absolutely gorgeous and very spacious. The pool area is equally appealing. The housekeeping leaves much to be desired. If you stay for any length of time they only clean every three days. They are supposed to come in daily to do light housekeeping. Most days the housekeeper showed up at 8 am and we weren't even out of bed. We asked her to return later and she never did. That happened three out of the six days we were there. They provide tiny, worthless trash bags in the kitchen area and we kept running out. With five people and cooking every day in the room it was hard not to generate trash. We started stacking it up next to the door hoping someone would come eventually and dispose of it. Two days after our arrival we were moved to a different floor due to electrical problems in our area. We received the call around 8:30 - 9:00 am and had fifteen minutes to pack our things and move four floors up. They did send a gentleman to help but he basically just put things on a cart as we handed them to him. It was so frustrating to delay our departure for Magic Kingdom to pack, move and unpack. Especially since we were finally settled, had gone grocery shopping and had a lot of food to move as well. I know they were thinking about the safety of their guests and it was beyond their control but they didn't seem apologetic about it. They should have offered something for all the trouble but they just said we were lucky because one guest had already left that morning and wouldn't be able to get into the room when they returned. We're lucky to have to pack up five people and a week's worth of groceries and move in the middle of our vacation?? Their customer service is lacking. The pool area was never crowded. Matter of fact, we were usually the only people there in the mornings. Don't expect to get any sun until about 11 am though. The way the building wraps around the pool keeps the sun out until then. That was good for my kids but not for me as I was interested in getting a tan. We had to clean bugs out of the pool daily. I'm not sure any staff member ever did so while we were there. That really surprised me. In conclusion...the location is wonderful, the amount we paid for the room was absolutely awesome and for that reason we didn't complain too much about the staff and inconveniences. If I had paid more it would have been a different story. All the staff we encountered were friendly but I just think they need much more.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: burtt75
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel during their Grand Opening Special and got this room for a great Value. We had a two bedroom suite...The size of the room in general was huge...the layout was great. The size of the bedrooms were large. The master bedroom was large with a hugh bathroom. The second bedroom was large also. I was so surprised that every TV was flat screens. THe kitchen was beautiful. The cons: the beds in each room were a little uncomfortable, the hotel is new so there were a little things missing in the rooms ex: clock/radios, brooms and blowdryers. But the plus side when you called downstairs they would send them right up. Also HUGE Beautiful pool.

Reviews.Title: “Please Do Not Believe What You Read!!!!!!!!! This is a fabulous Hotel”
Reviews.Author: travelagentreviews
Reviews.Content: Not sure what the other people are even talking about! I have stayed at this hotel several times (we are in Orlando often and almost always stay at Lake Eve) and use all the amenities. I haven't experienced anything but perfection!!!!!!! I am a Travel Agent (which I didn't let them know) and so I carefully scrutinize the places I stay because I would never recommend a Hotel I wouldn't return to. The location of this Hotel (for those going to Disney, Sea World, Universal) is excellent. Located in a safe part of town as well. The staff (all of them) is friendly and go over board to make your stay worry free. The property is spotless and beautiful. The maid staff accomodated our request for more towels, blankets, pillows, and anything we asked for no questions asked.

HotelInfo.Name: Lake Eve Resort
HotelInfo.Address: 12388 International Dr, Orlando, FL 32821
